nodes.text: The Passage From Perdition is one of the roleplaying games in West End Games' 1997 boxed set Mos Eisley Adventure Set. It takes place immediately after Jabba's death in Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi.
Mos Eisley is in chaos after the death of Jabba the Hutt's death. A group of spacers must protect the town from swoop gangs and rescue Diew Rejeff.
